hero_header.title: Five Fifths Voter
hero_header.description_2: A whole person, a whole community, a whole nation.
hero_header.quote: A whole person, a whole community, a whole nation.
hero_header.author: John Lewis

landing_page.mission: With Five Fifths Voter, we help put the power back in your hands. Our platform provides a personalized experience with useful tools to help marginalized voters overcome voting process roadblocks. Five Fifths Voter takes into account various voting journeys, such as first-time voters, veterans, minorities, legally disabled, the elderly, or those with felony convictions. Together, we can change the narrative of historically disenfranchised people in our democratic process.

educate.author: Francis Bacon
educate.message: Five Fifths Voter will educate disenfranchised voters with voting guidance and connection to up-to-date tools necessary to complete the voting process.
